title: Testing an AI tool for web analytics use cases: first observations
description: I like testing new AI tools that promise to simplify daily work. I thought sharing what I learn might be helpful to others.

title: What AI changed in my analytics work and what it didn’t
description: What it changed: - I can write SQL and JavaScript way faster. - My documentation is actually understandable for other people. [...]. What it didn’t change:...

title: Misconceptions I had about working in Data Analytics
description: I came from a strong SEO background when I took my first steps into data analytics. Once I started working as a Data Analytics Consultant, I quickly realized that my idea of the day-to-day work was not always accurate.

title: Goodbye to my role as Senior Data Analytics Consultant at DEPT.
description: With the end of 2025, I closed an important chapter and left my role at DEPT to start something new (more on that soon).
